  • Class Summary 
    Class Description

    Class CopperFoilEvent: event for the copper foil tool card

    Class CorkBackedEvent: client server event for the Cork Backed tool card

    Class CustomPatternEvent: client server event for the custom pattern of the player

    Class DisconnectionEvent: client server event for the disconnection

    Class LensCutter: client server event for Lens Cutter tool card
    PlayerChooseEvent
    Class PlayerChooseEvent: client server event for the choose of the step between using a tool card or moving a dice
    PlayerDraftPoolEvent
    Class PlayerDraftPoolEvent: client server event for rolling the draft pool
    PlayerMoveEvent
    Class PlayerMoveEvent: client server event for the move of the player
    PlayerNameEvent
    Class PlayerNameEvent: client server event for the choose of the player's name
    PlayerNextTurnEvent
    Class PlayerNextTurnEvent: client server event for the next turn
    PlayerNoTokenEvent
    Class PlayerNoTokensEvent: client server event for the player that decides to not use a tool card because of the tokens' cost
    PlayerPatternEvent
    Class PlayerPatternEvent: client server event for the choose of the pattern
    PlayerStartToolEvent
    Class PlayerStartToolEvent: client server event for the use of a tool card by the player

    Class ReconnectionEvent: client server event for the reconnection

    ToolCardStartEvent
    Class ToolCardStartEvent: client server event for using a tool card
